title: Behind The Idea #69: Kinder Morgan Learns Its Lesson With Kirk Spano
description: Our first podcast on Kinder Morgan (KMI) two weeks ago was not super well-received, so we brought on one of our critics, Seeking Alpha author and current KMI bull Kirk Spano, to discuss the company further. We get into some of the criticisms we had of the company - its use of non-GAAP metrics and the underrating of its commodity pricing exposure - as well as some of the criticisms readers had of us. Kirk also lays out his bull case for the company.
itunes:title: Kinder Morgan Learns Its Lesson With Kirk Spano
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We get more in the pipes with Kinder Morgan bull Kirk Spano to see what we missed last time
